title: Getting Started with Lucidi
content: Lucidi is an AI assistant that helps you manage your knowledge base. This document explains the basic concepts and how to get started with the application.

title: API Documentation
content: Complete API reference for Lucidi. Includes authentication, endpoints, request/response formats, and error handling. All endpoints use REST principles and return JSON responses.

title: Database Schema Guide
content: This guide explains the database schema used by Lucidi. It covers all tables, relationships, indexes, and constraints. Understanding the schema is essential for advanced customization.

title: Meeting Notes 2024-01-15
content: Discussion about Phase 3 implementation. Decided to use Docker for integration testing. Action items: Set up PostgreSQL and MySQL containers, create test suites, update documentation.

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
content: Solutions to common problems users encounter: connection issues, performance tuning, data migration, backup and restore procedures. Includes step-by-step debugging guides.
